data.content:
"It is fun time again. One more story.

You will meet a girl called Gauri. She is kind and helps her mother. 

 Do you help your mother and father? 

 Her mother wants to make scarecrows. To frighten the birds away. 

 A scarecrow is called a Bijooka or Kaak-Bhagoda in Hindi. It is put up to frighten birds away in the fields. A scarecrow is made of sticks and a pot for a head. People dress it up in clothes to look like a person. The birds think that it is a person and they fly away. 

 Let's see what these Scarecrows on Parade are up to.
You can listen to the audio again by clicking on the button.
